The paragraph does not contain any explicit mention of specific chemicals or receptors other than CYP. The mention of "CYP-induced cystitis" implies that CYP is a chemical or a group of chemicals causing the condition. Therefore, the only valid chemical entity identified from the paragraph is CYP.
